item.title: Trying out Ceph with Oh-My-Vagrant
item.description: Daniel P. Berrang√© wrote about trying out a single node ceph cluster. I decided to take his article and turn it into an Oh-My-Vagrant omv.yaml file. It took me about two minutes to do so, and two hours to debug a problem caused by something I had broken on my laptop. If you’d like to replicate his article in less than 5 minutes, pull down the omv.yaml file that I’ve just published and run omv up.
